alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 11 at 10:30PM EST until December 11 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM EST FOR SOUTHEASTERN SULLIVAN...CHESHIRE...WESTERN HILLSBOROUGH AND SOUTHWESTERN MERRIMACK COUNTIES... At 1030 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Ashland to Warner to near Antrim to near Swanzey, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Keene, Jaffrey, Henniker, Peterborough, Hopkinton, Winchester, Antrim, Greenfield, Lyndeborough, Bradford, Dublin, Francestown, Bennington, Richmond, Harrisville, Nelson, Gilsum, Marlborough, Rindge and Windsor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
